review.title: “Fun, but then went out of business”
review.pros: Pros – Fun, salary was good, employer kind, benefits excellent
review.cons: Cons – Company went out of business before we had much notice
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – let employees have advance notice of closure

review.title: “Only Work Here is You Realllly Need a Job.”
review.pros: Pros – The work environment is fairly laid back in terms of attire and work ethic. The CEO is very laid back as well. Good Benefits package.
review.cons: Cons – Poor Management. High Turnover rate. Most of the staff who have been there for more than 2 years suffer from personality disorders.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management should become more organized and less emotional.
